name: Gods from the Abyss (Alpha Demo)
description:
This is the demo for "Gods from the Abyss" , a local co-op side-scroller beat'em up inspired in classical arcade games like "Golden Axe", "Final Fight", "TMNT", etc, set in an eldritch-lovecraftian ambience.

I want to do my best, so I'm open to hear your suggestions and ideas for it.

I’m also curios about the performance, I’m programming in an old but good computer, and the game runs smoothly on it. It should work fine in any relatively modern computer, but if you encounter performance issues, I’d like to hear it.

The demo lacks some things that I want to add to the final game, like more attacks for the players, explosives, acid damage, more enemies...

The comic panels are done by the great Rafa Mata. Don't hesitate to take a look at his web!

And if you want to follow more updates of the game, follow me at Twitter.

I hope you like it, have fun!
